doc.field: Records of the Office of the Chancellor
Records of the Office of the Chancellor

Correspondence including: Dr. Barnard, Charles Butler, John W. Draper, J.C. Green, and a lettr from the Committee of Council of NYU to Howard Crosby, a letter from Crosby to the Committee of Council, and Crosby's acceptance as Chancellor; also a list of Medical Graduates; Reports of the Committee on changes in the curriculum; the notice of re-election of Dr. Crosby as Chancellor; inauguration, and the inauguration remarks of John Taylor Johnston; note, letters, clippings about Ferris' resignation; Ferris' resignation and Farewell address to the Council

Correspondence including: Dr. Barnard, Charles Butler, John W. Draper, J.C. Green, and a lettr from the Committee of Council of NYU to Howard Crosby, a letter from Crosby to the Committee of Council, and Crosby's acceptance as Chancellor; also a list of Medical Graduates; Reports of the Committee on changes in the curriculum; the notice of re-election of Dr. Crosby as Chancellor; inauguration, and the inauguration remarks of John Taylor Johnston; note, letters, clippings about Ferris' resignation; Ferris' resignation and Farewell address to the Council

Series I >> Correspondence including: Dr. Barnard, Charles Butler, John W. Draper, J.C.
